mutants.code:
def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) + 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) * 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 & b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 ^ b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 2
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:

    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 0
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - -1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X | mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X | mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 & mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 ^ mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (2 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (0 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (0 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X

def swap_bits(X: int, P1: int, P2: int, N: int) -> int:
    mask = (-1 << N) - 1
    a = (X & mask << P1) >> P1
    b = (X & mask << P2) >> P2
    X &= ~(mask << P1 | mask << P2)
    X |= a << P2 | b << P1
    return X
